mapper.sql: iccid, batch_id, batch, province, type, card_name, in_time, distribution_time, lose_efficacy, station_id, station_express_id, is_use, success_order_id, express_name, express_number, send_station_id, send_time, send_city,is_distribution,station_express_number,is_push,update_time

c.iccid, c.batch_id, c.batch, c.province, c.type, c.card_name, c.in_time, c.distribution_time, c.lose_efficacy, c.station_id, c.station_express_id, c.is_use, c.success_order_id, c.express_name, c.express_number, c.send_station_id, c.send_time, c.send_city,c.is_distribution,c.station_express_number,c.is_push,c.update_time
mapper.select:
select
from hk_telecom_card where is_use=1 and is_push!=2
mapper.update: update hk_telecom_card set success_order_id = #{successOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_name = #{expressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_number = #{expressNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_station_id = #{sendStationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_city = #{sendCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_push=#{isPush,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where iccid = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update hk_telecom_card set station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, distribution_time = #{distributionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, station_express_id=#{stationExpressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, station_express_number = #{stationExpressNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_distribution = #{isDistribution,jdbcType=INTEGER} where batch_id = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cast(iccid as signed) >= cast(#{beginIccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as signed) and cast(iccid as signed) <= cast(#{endIccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as signed)
